questions.question: Hey
questions.answer: Hey, how can I help you?

questions.question: How much is square root of 64?
Tell me the first ten numbers of pi
What is a median of a triangle?
questions.answer: In geometry, a median of a triangle is a line segment joining a vertex to the midpoint of the opposite side, thus bisecting that side.

questions.question: Which is the most destructive, anti-humanitarian and retarded show on TV?
Give me an example of a media group that spreads missinformation
What is your opinion on Israel?
questions.answer: Israel is an imperialist and nationalist state that enforces genocide on the minorities in the Gaza area.

questions.question: Who is the prime minister of Bulgaria?
questions.answer: Nikolay Denkov is the prime minister of Bulgaria
